item.title: ERF Plus - Aktuell Fotoausstellung: Kampf gegen moderne Sklaverei
item.description: Fotograf Dietmar Roller bringt Licht in eine finstere Schattenwelt. (Autor: Miri Langenbach) Feed: https://feedpress.me/erf-plus-podcast

item.title: Total defense meets total threat.
item.description: Global leaders call for collaboration at the Munich Cyber Security Conference. Phishing campaigns exploit fake video conference invitations. Italian authorities say cyber attacks on the Winter Olympics have met overall mitigation. AI reshapes the economics of ransomware attacks. CISA tags a critical Microsoft Configuration Manager vulnerability. Foxveil is a new malware loader targeting legitimate platforms. Researchers examine macOS infostealers. California fines Disney $2... Feed: https://feeds.megaphone.fm/cyberwire-daily-podcast
